mapper.select: select case when rv.id is null then UUID() else rv.id end id, ad.pid, ad.id applyDataId, #{ ybChsVerifyView.applyDateStr} applyDateStr, ad.appealEndDate, ad.payPlaceType, ad.ydState, ad.areaName, ad.yyjgCode, ad.yyjgName, ad.deptName, ad.doctorName, ad.medicalType, ad.zymzNumber, ad.insuredName, ad.enterHospitalDate, ad.outHospitalDate, ad.settlementDate, ad.cardNumber, ad.projectCode, ad.projectName, ad.projectYyName, ad.ruleName, ad.violateCsPrice, ad.violatePrice, ad.violateReason, ad.zdNote, ad.costDate, ad.insuredType, ad.num, ad.price, ad.medicalPrice, ad.tcPayPrice, ad.specs, ad.jx, ad.jgLevel, ad.orderNum, rv.verifyDoctorCode, concat(rv.verifyDoctorCode,'-',rv.verifyDoctorName) verifyDoctorName, rv.verifyDksId, concat(rv.verifyDksId,'-',rv.verifyDksName) verifyDksName, case when rv.id is null then 0 else 1 end isVerify, rv.sendPersonId, rv.sendPersonName, rv.sendDate, rv.STATE, rv.areaType from yb_chs_apply_data ad LEFT JOIN yb_chs_verify rv ON ad.id = rv.applyDataId where ad.pid = #{ybChsVerifyView.pid} and rv.state = #{ybChsVerifyView.state}
select count(1) from yb_chs_verify WHERE applyDateStr= #{ybChsVerifyView.applyDateStr} and areaType = #{ ybChsVerifyView.areaType}
